typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		marque_id as string,
		marque_name as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{ATC performance} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		no_offre as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> venteDirecte
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		marque_id as string,
		marque_name as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		NoCli as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		{code postal} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		qt_plateforme_final as string,
		ca_plateforme_final as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSCModel
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque_id as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		no_offre as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{ATC performance} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PartedisModel
source(output(
		marque_id as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		month as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		no_offre as string,
		agence as string,
		canal as string,
		canal_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		Matricule as string,
		NomATC as string,
		ATC as string,
		Offre as string,
		{ATC performance} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> VanMarkes
POSSAMidString select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		id_canal_final = {Canal distribution},
		{ATC Performance} = {ATC performance},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> oPartedis
DSCModel select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque_id,
		marque_name,
		no_offre = NoOffre,
		NoCli,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final = {Canal final},
		{ATC Performance},
		{Code postal} = {code postal},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		qt_plateforme_final,
		ca_plateforme_final,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDSC
venteDirecte select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		marque_name,
		canal_final,
		id_canal_final = {Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString,
		reference,
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		yearmonth,
		distributeur,
		{Code postal},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} = {Agence commerciale},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{ATC Performance} = {ATC performance},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameColumnsVenteDirecte
PartedisModel derive(POSSAMidString = coalesce(POSSAMidString , {Recept de march})) ~> POSSAMidString
endDSC, oPartedis union(byName: true)~> UnionDSCPartedis
UnionDSCPartedis, renameColumnsVenteDirecte union(byName: true)~> UnionVenteDirecte
UnionVenteDirecte, endVM union(byName: true)~> UnionVM
VanMarkes select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final = {Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString,
		{Destinataire facture},

		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		yearmonth,

		month,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,

		{Code postal},
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC,
		Offre,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
select1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,

		ATC,
		Matricule,
		NomATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2

		NomATC
	),

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endVM
UnionVM sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Org_commerciale as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,

		{Cout standard cd�} as string,

		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,

		{Code postal} as string,
